metadata.title: Supplementary Materials: Chromatography (HPLC) with Quadrupole-Time-of- 3 Flight Mass Spectroscopy (qTOF-MS) and Antiviral Activities of Phlorotannins from Ecklonia cava

body_text.text: The viral-infected cells were exposed to compounds 11, 12, 13, and 14 (20 µM) and 107 ribavirin (20 µM) as a positive control. After 1 day of incubation, the cell lysates were 108 collected and target proteins were measured using Western blotting method. Equal amounts 109 of proteins were loaded on SDS-polyacrylamide gels. After transferred to PVDF 110 membranes, they were firstly incubated with neuraminidase antibody overnight. For 111 removing bound primary and secondary antibodies, the membranes were incubated with a 112

Restore TM Western blot stripping buffer (Thermo Sci.) and they were then detected the β-113 actin protein using a LAS4000 luminescent image analyzer. Sample names were from 1-7 114 as follows: uninfected ctrl, viral-infected (vi) ctrl, vi + ribavirin (20 µM), vi + 11, 12, 13, 115 and 14 (20 µM), respectively. Data were included in the final analysis in Figure 4A . 116 Figure S179 . Inhibitory effects of compound 12 on the viral proteins synthesis in a 118 concentration-dependent manner; original uncropped blots. 119
The procedure of Western blot experiment was successfully carried as above described in 120 Figure S18 . The membranes were firstly detected neuraminidase or hemagglutinin proteins. 121

FIGREF1.text: Using a stripping buffer (Thermo Sci.) for removing bound primary and secondary 122 antibodies, the membranes were then incubated with β-actin antibody. (A) Sample names 123were from 1-7 as follows: uninfected ctrl, viral-infected (vi) ctrl, vi + ribavirin (20 µM), vi 124 + 12 (5, 10, 20, and 40 µM), respectively. (B) Sample names were from 1-6 as follows: 125 uninfected ctrl, vi ctrl, vi + ribavirin (20 µM), vi + 12 (5, 10, and 20 µM), respectively. (C) 126Sample names were from 1-12 as follows: uninfected ctrl-1; vi ctrl-1; vi + ribavirin (20 127 µM)-1, -2; vi + 12 (10 µM)-1, -2; vi + 12 (20 µM)-1, -2; vi + 12 (40 µM)-1, -2; vi ctrl-2; 128 uninfected ctrl-2; respectively.Figure4B was included in the final analysis. (A) Key HMBC correlations of compounds 1 and 2.
